sentences.en: And, lest we forget, Einstein wrote his most influential papers while working as a clerk.
sentences.cn: 大家不要忘记，爱因斯坦最有影响力的论文还是当文员的时候写的。

sentences.en: Be careful lest you ( should ) fall from the tree.
sentences.cn: 小心,不要从树上掉下来.

sentences.en: Be careful lest you fall from that tree.
sentences.cn: 要当心,以免从树上摔下来.

sentences.en: Close the window quickly lest the raindrops ( should ) slant in.
sentences.cn: 快关窗户,别让雨点 潲 进来.

sentences.en: He gripped his brother's arm lest he be trampled by the mob.
sentences.cn: 他紧抓着他兄弟的胳膊，怕他让暴民踩着。

sentences.en: He paused, afraid lest he say too much.
sentences.cn: 他停顿下来，唯恐说得太多。

sentences.en: I fear lest we commit an inexcusable blunder.
sentences.cn: 我为我们会犯不可原谅的错误而担忧.

sentences.en: I feared lest I should be late again.
I stayed in lest I should catch cold.
sentences.cn: 我怕伤风,所以呆在屋里.

sentences.en: I'll remind him lest he should forget it.
sentences.cn: 怕他忘记,我会提醒他的.

sentences.en: Let me put down your telephone number lest I forget it.
sentences.cn: 让我先记下你的电话号码,以免忘了.

sentences.en: Read in a good light lest It'should hurt your eyes.
sentences.cn: 到明处来看书,免得搞坏了视力.

sentences.en: She turned away from the window lest anyone see them.
sentences.cn: 她转身离开窗边，免得有人看见他们。

sentences.en: The president has gone along with the hardliners lest they be tempted to oust him.
sentences.cn: 总统同意了强硬派的意见，以免他们产生赶他下台的念头。

sentences.en: They decided to retreat lest they would be between two fires.
sentences.cn: 他们决定撤退,否则就要受两面夹击.

sentences.en: They spoke in whispers lest they should be heard.
sentences.cn: 他们低声耳语惟恐被人听见.

sentences.en: While they have not got their aims , their anxiety is how to get them ; when they have got them, their anxiety is lest they should lose them.
sentences.cn: 其未得之也, 患得之; 既得之, 患失之.

trans.tran_en: in order to make sure that something will not happen
